{"handle": "devrel", "community_addon": {"id": "ftd6ha", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Office Hours \\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\\nNEAR Developer Office Hours are held several times a week by DevHub or other community groups, and are a great way to level up your NEAR development or just meet other developers in the community! We host office hours on the NEAR [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/zfhfRpaM4m), which is also a great place to ask questions via chat!\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n#### NEAR DevHub - Developer Office Hours \\\\u{26a1}\\\\u{fe0f}\\\\\\\\n***When***: Thursday - 11:00 \\\\u{2013} 12:00 UTC (1:00 PM - 2:00PM CEST) & 18:00 \\\\u{2013} 19:00 UTC (11AM - 12PM PST)\\\\\\\\n***Where***: NEAR official Discord Server \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"Developer Office Hours\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" Channel \\\\\\\\n- https://discord.com/channels/490367152054992913/914965851646603264\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nJoin these sessions get dev support on your projects, chat about developing on NEAR and get to know the development community better\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----- \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n#### NEAR Build DAO \\\\u{1f3c6}\\\\\\\\nOffice hours : Wednesday - 17:00 UTC / 12pm ET\\\\\\\\n \\\\u{201c}Hack-it Fridays\\\\u{201d}: Friday - 17:00 UTC / 12pm ET\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n#### NEAR HORIZON Founder Fridays \\\\u{1f91d}\\\\\\\\n***When***: Friday - 14:30 - 15:15 UTC (15:30 CET) \\\\\\\\n***Where***: https://shortlink.near.foundation/horizon-office-hours-rsvp (Requires Booking)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nContent geared toward Founders featuring: AMA\\\\\\'s from providers familiar with Web3 and NEAR ecosystem, ecosystem project demos, and updates from NDC, Horizon, and others...\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n-----\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n#### NEAR Chinese Developer Community Office Hours \\\\u{1f680}\\\\\\\\n***When***: Friday - 12:00 - 13:00 UTC (20:00-21:00 UTC +8)\\\\\\\\n***Where***: https://meeting.tencent.com/dm/a3xBOJfGHDYH\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThe NEAR Chinese Developer Community Office Hour is held every Friday evening at 20:00 (UTC +8), featuring updates on NEAR engineering and ecosystem, course demos and open discussions.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nNEAR\\\\u{4e2d}\\\\u{6587}\\\\u{5f00}\\\\u{53d1}\\\\u{8005}\\\\u{793e}\\\\u{533a}\\\\u{7684}Office Hour\\\\u{6bcf}\\\\u{5468}\\\\u{4e94}\\\\u{665a}\\\\u{4e0a}20:00(UTC+8)\\\\u{4e3e}\\\\u{884c}\\\\u{ff0c}\\\\u{5185}\\\\u{5bb9}\\\\u{5305}\\\\u{62ec}NEAR\\\\u{5de5}\\\\u{7a0b}\\\\u{548c}\\\\u{751f}\\\\u{6001}\\\\u{7684}\\\\u{6700}\\\\u{65b0}\\\\u{8fdb}\\\\u{5c55}\\\\u{3001}\\\\u{8bfe}\\\\u{7a0b}\\\\u{6f14}\\\\u{793a}\\\\u{4ee5}\\\\u{53ca}\\\\u{5f00}\\\\u{653e}\\\\u{5f0f}\\\\u{8ba8}\\\\u{8bba}\\\\u{3002}\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Office hours \\\\u{1f468}\\\\u{200d}\\\\u{1f4bb}"}}

{"data": {"devrel.community.devhub.near": {"profile": {"name": "Decentralized DevRel", "tags": {"devrel": "", "community": "", "announcements": ""}, "image": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreignlfyjejbvnclxbkiybjejjjqgelvrjyqxd4gscb2maoy3qw7ame"}, "linktree": {"github": null, "twitter": null, "website": "near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=devrel", "telegram": "+niaMtWIjY3ZlZTVh"}, "description": "A group of community contributors who engage with the NEAR developer community, gather feedback, and coordinate community calls and events.\\\\n\\\\nLearn more about our community [on DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=devrel).", "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreicic7xwcw4no6kqpcqlhe3hcszlkfp5u53yw5a4x4lap3uzlndbcm"}}}, "discussions.devrel.community.devhub.near": {"profile": {"name": "Decentralized DevRel (Community Discussions)", "tags": {"devrel": "", "community": "", "discussions": ""}, "image": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreignlfyjejbvnclxbkiybjejjjqgelvrjyqxd4gscb2maoy3qw7ame"}, "linktree": {"github": null, "twitter": null, "website": "near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=devrel", "telegram": "+niaMtWIjY3ZlZTVh"}, "description": "Providing community management and support to developers\\\\n\\\\nLearn more about our community [on DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=devrel).", "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreicic7xwcw4no6kqpcqlhe3hcszlkfp5u53yw5a4x4lap3uzlndbcm"}}}}}

{"id": 73, "body": {"name": "Optimised NEAR RPC for Enterprises, Startups & Public", "summary": "Seracle has partnered with Oracle.com to facilitate one-click deployment of optimized, enterprise-grade NEAR RPC on Oracle.com. Check out the complete demo here: https://youtu.be/zsOZ1ADm-iM", "category": "Tooling & Infrastructure", "timeline": {"status": "REJECTED", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "frol.near", "description": "**Milestone1:** Partnership with Oracle.com, to be a part of the innovative partner network and list NEAR on Oracle Marketplace.\\\\nRefer: https://partner-finder.oracle.com/catalog/Partner/SCPP-SERACLE.\\\\nTimeline: 2 months, including back and forth for partnership due diligence and approval.\\\\n**Requested Milestone grant: $18,544\\\\nStatus: Completed**\\\\nBreakdown:\\\\nOracle billing: $544\\\\nSeracle costs: $18,000 worth of technical and human resources to pitch, follow up, and get approved by Oracle.\\\\n\\\\n**Milestone2:** Build litenode architecture & integrate with Oracle.com\\\\nDevelop litenode architecture using Terraform that enables quicker deployment and low maintenance of RPC nodes in a couple of clicks from Oracle\\\\\\'s marketplace.\\\\nRefer: https://cloudmarketplace.oracle.com/marketplace/en_US/listing/162099600?_afrLoop=526715820468777&_afrWindowMode=2&Adf-Window-Id=w1b31icxkpu&_afrFS=16&_afrMT=screen&_afrMFW=1792&_afrMFH=889&_afrMFDW=1792&_afrMFDH=1120&_afrMFC=8&_afrMFCI=0&_afrMFM=0&_afrMFR=192&_afrMFG=0&_afrMFS=0&_afrMFO=0\\\\nTimeline: 6 months, including rework on Terraform, multiple architecture changes to enable auto-deployment of NEAR RPC node in a couple of clicks.\\\\n**Status: Completed\\\\nRequested Milestone grant: $101,800**\\\\nBreakdown:\\\\nOracle billing: $76,800 for 2 years of pre-sync RPC node hosting, where average monthly billing is $3,200.\\\\nAlready 6 months worth of billing paid/outstanding to be paid by Seracle.\\\\nSeracle billing: $65,000 includes technical resources for 6 months to develop on Terraform, discussions with Oracle team, and rework on architecture to comply with integration requirements. Several email and Slack chat proofs can be provided.\\\\n\\\\n**Milestone3:** Public RPC endpoint provided by Seracle and hosted on Oracle.\\\\nHost, maintain RPC node of NEAR and also provide API layer on NEAR blockchain operations enabling access to a larger group of developers. Additionally, a Postman-like sandbox to test NEAR blockchain APIs.\\\\nRefer:\\\\nPublic RPC: https://api.seracle.com/saas/baas/rpc/near/mainnet/public/\\\\nAPI Docs: https://docs.seracle.com/near/experimental/experimental-changes-all-account-changes\\\\nNEAR sandbox: https://www.seracle.com/chains/near\\\\n**Status: Completed\\\\nRequested Milestone grant: $67,200**\\\\nOracle billing: $19,200 for 2 years of public RPC hosting with an average of $800 per month.\\\\nSeracle billing: $48,000, 6 months development of public RPC NEAR infra, APIs, and sandbox.\\\\n\\\\n**Milestone4**: Content and publish a blog on Oracle.com & press release\\\\nNear Blockchain integration with Oracle.com facilitated by Seracle blog on Oracle.com and press releases with quotes from Oracle.com executive. Content creator already working on video, articles, press releases, and you can refer: https://youtu.be/zsOZ1ADm-iM\\\\n**Status: In progress\\\\nRequested Milestone grant: $25,000,** includes a couple of major press releases and covers legal costs if any.", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "65cbe64bd243dc9ad2a4028e865a55b09bc8417d81f694b9bee605b23cbd4e38", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "212544", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": []}

{"body": {"name": "Near Innovators Hackathon \\\\t", "summary": "The NEAR Innovators Hackathon, a 3-day event in Nairobi, aims to empower developers to build innovative decentralized applications using NEAR Protocol\\\\\\'s advanced features like sharding, low fees, and a user-friendly environment. By providing workshops, mentorship, and rewards, this hackathon tackles the need for practical blockchain solutions in areas like data ownership and decentralized AI, fostering groundbreaking projects that will strengthen the NEAR developer community.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n", "category": "Events & Hackathons", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "bpolania.near", "description": "**Event Introduction\\\\n**\\\\nThe NEAR Innovators Hackathon is a dynamic, 3-day, in-person event in Nairobi, Kenya, that brings together developers, entrepreneurs, and blockchain enthusiasts to explore the full potential of the NEAR Protocol. Designed as a unique opportunity to innovate and build, this hackathon will empower participants to utilize NEAR Protocol\\\\\\'s advanced features for creating decentralized applications that solve real-world challenges.\\\\n\\\\nDuring the 3-day event, the NEAR Innovators Hackathon will immerse participants in hands-on workshops and mentorship sessions where they can refine their skills and gain in-depth knowledge of NEAR\\\\\\'s tools and technologies. By collaborating with fellow developers, designers, and entrepreneurs, participants will not only learn but also network with like-minded individuals and industry leaders.\\\\n\\\\n**The hackathon will focus on the following themes:\\\\n**\\\\nAccount Abstraction: Simplifying blockchain interactions for seamless user experiences across chains.\\\\nDecentralized AI: Harnessing decentralized AI for privacy-preserving machine learning or enhancing dApps.\\\\nData Availability: Providing secure, reliable access to decentralized data networks.\\\\nOpen Source: Contributing to NEAR\\\\\\'s open-source ecosystem with tools, libraries, and frameworks.\\\\nData Ownership: Empowering individuals to control and monetize their personal data securely.\\\\nPrivacy: Developing privacy-focused protocols like zero-knowledge proofs and confidential transactions.\\\\nReal-World Applications: Building practical decentralized applications that address global and regional challenges.\\\\n\\\\n**Key goals include:\\\\n**\\\\nFostering Innovation: Encourage participants to create groundbreaking applications that leverage NEAR Protocol\\\\\\'s scalability, sharding architecture, and developer-friendly environment.\\\\n\\\\nSkill Building: Provide a comprehensive understanding of how to build and deploy dApps using NEAR\\\\u{2019}s open-source developer tools and resources.\\\\n\\\\nCommunity Engagement: Establish a strong network of NEAR developers and enthusiasts who can continue to collaborate and expand the ecosystem long after the hackathon ends.\\\\n\\\\nReal-World Solutions: Inspire teams to develop decentralized applications with practical use cases that address global and regional challenges, benefiting a wide range of industries.\\\\n\\\\n**Organizer Introduction\\\\n**\\\\nThe NEAR Innovators Hackathon is organized by a dedicated team of blockchain professionals passionate about advancing blockchain education and innovation. Our team includes:\\\\n\\\\nNashons Agate: Nashons is leading the development of Nexuspay, a stablecoin-based payment system that facilitates secure transactions for African countries. He has previously hosted successful blockchain meetups and events in Kenya, including a Flow meetup. \\\\nLinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/in/nashons-agate-165683226/\\\\nTwitter: https://twitter.com/agatenash\\\\n\\\\nZuhura Kimani: Founder of LedgerLady, Zuhura is dedicated to empowering women through blockchain education. Her organization helps onboard women into Web3 and provides resources and educational materials. She has organized numerous meetups for major blockchain platforms like Arbitrum, TON, and Solana in Kenya. \\\\nLinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/in/zuhura-kimani-1a192927a/\\\\nTwitter: https://twitter.com/ledgerlady_\\\\n\\\\nVictor Gunga: Victor is a community advocate for Arbitrum and Graph Protocol. He currently oversees community engagement for these protocols and has successfully hosted the Arbitrum campus tours and hackathons. \\\\nLinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/in/victorgunga/\\\\nTwitter: https://twitter.com/vicgunga\\\\n\\\\n**Previous Events\\\\n**\\\\nArbitrum  Meetup/workshops\\\\nhttps://x.com/vicgunga/status/1764269130021040160\\\\nhttps://x.com/vicgunga/status/1761675875106345006\\\\nhttps://x.com/vicgunga/status/1759263063402844655\\\\nhttps://x.com/vicgunga/status/1766576296790753583\\\\nSponsor: Arbitrum Foundation\\\\n\\\\nSolana Nairobi Meetup\\\\nhttps://x.com/ledgerlady_/status/1771803081493119068\\\\nSponsor: Solana Foundation\\\\n\\\\nChainlink Smartcon Watchparty 2023\\\\nLink: https://twitter.com/doyeninit/status/1711734406291845444?t=TSkwJ651Mat6InYAYXdjYA&s=19\\\\nSponsor: Chainlink\\\\n\\\\nGnosis Nairobi Meetup\\\\nLink: https://twitter.com/GriffinOduol/status/1673251261498507264?t=kxXG4NWn0C2PYw7iuOAZRQ&s=\\\\nSponsor: Gnosis Builders\\\\n\\\\nGnosis Ethsafari Side Event\\\\nLink: https://twitter.com/W3E_Kenyan/status/1706240688307007770?t=lb6-qrsHgwA-5TU_8BNdNg&s=19\\\\nSponsor: Gnosis Builders\\\\n\\\\nGnosis Builders Kenya Hackathon\\\\nLink: https://twitter.com/W3E_Kenyan/status/1686255071862878209?t=VOmggozRhP8Mja9KZHYnEw&s=19\\\\nSponsor: Gnosis Builders\\\\n\\\\nFlow Nairobi Meetup\\\\nLink: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1-2TbDFBpnapIwVmq36MNR2zea0L8619h?usp=sharing\\\\nSponsor: Flow\\\\n\\\\nTON Nairobi Meetup\\\\nLink: https://twitter.com/ledgerlady_/status/1771461104343888340?t=KrBPtk9spD9KHgw7uoMH1A&s=19\\\\nSponsor: TON foundation\\\\n\\\\n**Event Impact\\\\n**\\\\nDeveloper Skills Expansion: Participants will receive hands-on training in developing decentralized applications using NEAR Protocol\\\\\\'s developer-friendly environment. By understanding and applying NEAR\\\\\\'s unique features attendees will gain valuable, real-world skills directly applicable to blockchain projects.\\\\n\\\\nInnovative Solutions: The hackathon will inspire the creation of cutting-edge solutions that leverage NEAR\\\\\\'s scalability and interoperability. By building projects across various themes like decentralized AI, account abstraction, and data ownership, developers will showcase the limitless possibilities of NEAR, providing the ecosystem with innovative applications and prototypes.\\\\n\\\\nCommunity Building: The event will cultivate a vibrant NEAR community by fostering connections between developers, entrepreneurs, and enthusiasts. Through workshops, mentorships, and team collaboration, participants will strengthen their networks, creating a support system that continues beyond the hackathon.\\\\n\\\\nBroader NEAR Ecosystem Growth: The hackathon will generate widespread awareness and enthusiasm for NEAR Protocol, leading to increased adoption and the growth of the NEAR ecosystem. By attracting both Web2 and Web3 developers, the event will onboard new talent into NEAR\\\\\\'s developer base, helping build a thriving, diverse ecosystem.\\\\n\\\\nReal-World Applications: Participants will focus on building practical applications that address real-world challenges using NEAR Protocol\\\\\\'s robust framework. These projects could span various industries, from finance to healthcare to supply chain management, thus demonstrating NEAR\\\\\\'s ability to transform everyday problems into decentralized opportunities.\\\\n\\\\nResearch and Development: The event will contribute to NEAR Protocol\\\\\\'s ongoing research and development by uncovering new use cases and features that the NEAR team can integrate into future improvements.\\\\n\\\\n**Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)\\\\n**\\\\nParticipation Metrics:\\\\nTotal Attendees: Aim to attract at least 200 developers, entrepreneurs, and enthusiasts.\\\\nActive Hackathon Participants: Secure a minimum of 100 active participants who will develop and submit projects.\\\\n\\\\nProject Development and Quality:\\\\nProjects Submitted: Target at least 40 unique project submissions across the prioritized categories, all utilizing NEAR Protocol.\\\\nQuality Projects: Ensure at least 15 projects qualify for potential incubation, further development, or partnership with NEAR or associated partners.\\\\n\\\\nNEAR Ecosystem Growth:\\\\nNew NEAR Accounts: Facilitate the creation of at least 250 new NEAR wallet accounts.\\\\nDeveloper Community Engagement: Encourage participants to join the NEAR developer community, remaining engaged with follow-up programs or projects.\\\\n\\\\nSkill Development:\\\\nWorkshop Completion: Achieve an 80% completion rate for participants attending the NEAR-focused training workshops.\\\\n\\\\nFeedback and Satisfaction:\\\\nParticipant Satisfaction: Achieve a satisfaction rate of 85% or higher based on post-event surveys.\\\\n\\\\nSponsor Feedback: Collect positive feedback from the partners and sponsors involved in the hackathon.\\\\n\\\\nReal-World Impact:\\\\nReal-World Solutions: Develop at least 10 projects that have a clear path to implementation or further development, providing practical applications for the NEAR Protocol.\\\\n\\\\n**Evaluation Factors\\\\n**\\\\nProjects will be evaluated based on:\\\\n\\\\nNEAR Protocol Integration: Effective and innovative use of NEAR Protocol\\\\\\'s features.\\\\nMarket Potential: Addressing current market needs or proposing unique use cases.\\\\nTeam Composition: Diversity and collaboration among team members.\\\\nTechnical Execution: Quality of code and technical implementation.\\\\nScalability: Potential for future growth and real-world impact.\\\\n\\\\n**Funding Requested\\\\n**\\\\nEvent Space: $2,000 \\\\nRefreshments: $1,800\\\\nBanners: $400 \\\\nMerchandise: $1,000\\\\nPhotography: $450\\\\nMultimedia Equipment: $600 \\\\nBounties/Rewards: $4,500 \\\\nTotal $10750\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "vicgunga.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "10750", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": []}

{"data": {"devhub.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *Events & Hackathons* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @vicgunga.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}Near Innovators Hackathon \\\\\\\\t\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThe NEAR Innovators Hackathon, a 3-day event in Nairobi, aims to empower developers to build innovative decentralized applications using NEAR Protocol\\\\\\'s advanced features like sharding, low fees, and a user-friendly environment. By providing workshops, mentorship, and rewards, this hackathon tackles the need for practical blockchain solutions in areas like data ownership and decentralized AI, fostering groundbreaking projects that will strengthen the NEAR developer community.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=77)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

{"proposal": {"id": 77, "snapshot": {"name": "Near Innovators Hackathon \\\\t", "labels": [], "summary": "The NEAR Innovators Hackathon, a 3-day event in Nairobi, aims to empower developers to build innovative decentralized applications using NEAR Protocol\\\\\\'s advanced features like sharding, low fees, and a user-friendly environment. By providing workshops, mentorship, and rewards, this hackathon tackles the need for practical blockchain solutions in areas like data ownership and decentralized AI, fostering groundbreaking projects that will strengthen the NEAR developer community.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n", "category": "Events & Hackathons", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "editor_id": "vicgunga.near", "timestamp": "1715249077508389963", "supervisor": "bpolania.near", "description": "**Event Introduction\\\\n**\\\\nThe NEAR Innovators Hackathon is a dynamic, 3-day, in-person event in Nairobi, Kenya, that brings together developers, entrepreneurs, and blockchain enthusiasts to explore the full potential of the NEAR Protocol. Our team includes:\\\\n\\\\nNashons Agate: Nashons is leading the development of Nexuspay, a stablecoin-based payment system that facilitates secure transactions for African countries. He has previously hosted successful blockchain meetups and events in Kenya, including a Flow meetup. \\\\nLinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/in/nashons-agate-165683226/\\\\nTwitter: https://twitter.com/agatenash\\\\n\\\\nZuhura Kimani: Founder of LedgerLady, Zuhura is dedicated to empowering women through blockchain education. Her organization helps onboard women into Web3 and provides resources and educational materials. She has organized numerous meetups for major blockchain platforms like Arbitrum, TON, and Solana in Kenya. \\\\nLinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/in/zuhura-kimani-1a192927a/\\\\nTwitter: https://twitter.com/ledgerlady_\\\\n\\\\nVictor Gunga: Victor is a community advocate for Arbitrum and Graph Protocol. He currently oversees community engagement for these protocols and has successfully hosted the Arbitrum campus tours and hackathons. \\\\nLinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/in/victorgunga/\\\\nTwitter: https://twitter.com/vicgunga\\\\n\\\\n**Previous Events\\\\n**\\\\nArbitrum  Meetup/workshops\\\\nhttps://x.com/vicgunga/status/1764269130021040160\\\\nhttps://x.com/vicgunga/status/1761675875106345006\\\\nhttps://x.com/vicgunga/status/1759263063402844655\\\\nhttps://x.com/vicgunga/status/1766576296790753583\\\\nSponsor: Arbitrum Foundation\\\\n\\\\nSolana Nairobi Meetup\\\\nhttps://x.com/ledgerlady_/status/1771803081493119068\\\\nSponsor: Solana Foundation\\\\n\\\\nChainlink Smartcon Watchparty 2023\\\\nLink: https://twitter.com/doyeninit/status/1711734406291845444?t=TSkwJ651Mat6InYAYXdjYA&s=19\\\\nSponsor: Chainlink\\\\n\\\\nGnosis Nairobi Meetup\\\\nLink: https://twitter.com/GriffinOduol/status/1673251261498507264?t=kxXG4NWn0C2PYw7iuOAZRQ&s=\\\\nSponsor: Gnosis Builders\\\\n\\\\nGnosis Ethsafari Side Event\\\\nLink: https://twitter.com/W3E_Kenyan/status/1706240688307007770?t=lb6-qrsHgwA-5TU_8BNdNg&s=19\\\\nSponsor: Gnosis Builders\\\\n\\\\nGnosis Builders Kenya Hackathon\\\\nLink: https://twitter.com/W3E_Kenyan/status/1686255071862878209?t=VOmggozRhP8Mja9KZHYnEw&s=19\\\\nSponsor: Gnosis Builders\\\\n\\\\nFlow Nairobi Meetup\\\\nLink: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1-2TbDFBpnapIwVmq36MNR2zea0L8619h?usp=sharing\\\\nSponsor: Flow\\\\n\\\\nTON Nairobi Meetup\\\\nLink: https://twitter.com/ledgerlady_/status/1771461104343888340?t=KrBPtk9spD9KHgw7uoMH1A&s=19\\\\nSponsor: TON foundation\\\\n\\\\n**Event Impact\\\\n**\\\\nDeveloper Skills Expansion: Participants will receive hands-on training in developing decentralized applications using NEAR Protocol\\\\\\'s developer-friendly environment.
